product_name: New Balance Fresh Foam 980 Road-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: Developed using specialized design software, the New Balance Fresh Foam 980 Road-Running Shoes feature breathable air mesh and simple no-sew overlays that wrap the feet in the right places.
short_description: Developed using specialized design software, the New Balance Fresh Foam 980 Road-Running Shoes feature breathable air mesh and simple no-sew overlays that wrap the feet in the right places.
